# TimelineView.Context.Cadence.live

**Case**

Updates the view continuously.

## Declaration

```swift
case live
```

## Getting cadences

- **TimelineView.Context.Cadence.seconds**: Updates the view approximately once per second.
- **TimelineView.Context.Cadence.minutes**: Updates the view approximately once per minute.

items.description: Updates the view approximately once per second.
items.name: TimelineView.Context.Cadence.seconds

items.description: Updates the view approximately once per minute.
